widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

description: Hi, my name is Carlos Molina. I'm 38 years old, and I'm from Hermosillo, Sonora. I have worked for more than eight years as a Linux sysadmin. I like to face new challenges and contribute as much as I can to the team. I love to spend time with my family. In my free time, I like to listen to music and take care of my plants.

My name is Karla, and I am 25 years old. I have 4.5 years of experience in the System Administrator and DevOps area. I am currently studying for a master's degree in Education. I like teamwork, and I hope to be an important and helpful part of the Justia team.
* She will join the team on Dec 7th.
